name: Girl and Goblin
detailed_description:
"Girl and Goblin", as a puzzle game, has many innovations, which are different from ordinary puzzles.Each picture is no longer irrelevant, but connected into a "story".There will also be a special lens after completing the puzzle.

Sakura, a novice adventurer, alone in pursuit of goblin to the depths, accidentally by...

The features of "Girl and Goblin"
include:
  • 1500 achievements
  • 13 pieces of pretty girls CG
  • To find out the whole story by completing the puzzle.
  • 15 levels.

Open cheating according to "F"
Stay at least 10 seconds at each level to activate all achievements

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Arabic*, Korean*, Japanese*, Vietnamese*, Simplified Chinese*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,e3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,e3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
